member.name: ISyncMgrConflict.GetConflictIdInfo
member.summary: Gets information that identifies a conflict within a conflict store.
member.param: A pointer to a conflict ID info structure. See .
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrConflict.GetItemsArray
member.param: The address of a pointer to an array.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrConflict.GetProperty
member.summary: Gets a conflict property, given a property key.

param.name: propkey
param.para: A reference to the property key for which the property is being requested. Any property key is valid here, including but not limited to the following values.
Sync handler that created the conflict.
Sync item that created the conflict.

member.param: When this method returns, contains a structure that contains the requested property.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrConflict.GetResolutionHandler
member.summary: Gets the resolution handler for the conflict.
member.param: A reference to the ID for the resolution handler.
When this method returns, contains the interface pointer requested in riid.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrConflict.Resolve
member.summary: Resolves the conflict using its own sync handler, controls UI.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrConflict
member.summary: Exposes methods that provide information about a conflict retrieved from a conflict store, and allows the conflict to be resolved.
